question: Which Gothic-style church in Cēsis, Latvia, was consecrated in 1284?
asked_question_translated: Katera gotska cerkev v Cēsisu v Latviji je bila posvečena leta 1284?
answer: Gotska cerkev v Cēsisu v Latviji, ki je bila posvečena leta 1284, je cerkev sv. Janeza.
answer_translated_eng: The Gothic church in Cēsis, Latvia, consecrated in 1284, is the Church of St John.
